Tunable.name: ring_doorbell_state
Tunable.description: The state for telling a Sim to try to ring the doorbell followed by inviting themselves in.

Tunable.name: situation_job
Tunable.description: A reference to the SituationJob used for the Sim invited over.

TunableEnum.name: purpose
TunableEnum.description: The purpose/reason used to create the venue type specific visit situation, after the invited sim attempts to ring the door bell. This should be tuned to Invite In, but since that is a dynamic enum you must do it yourself.
